title: Cosmic Ashe Skin Problem
body:
I have just received an E-mail from Event cinema's with my skin code.
Problem is, I had paid for 4 tickets for my buddies and I to go.
why is there only one code? 
Initially it said 1 code per ticket purchased, now it says one code per ticket transaction.
Riot, can you please help me with this?
This is unfair to 3/4 of my group.

replies.body: This definitely shouldn't have been the case and we're following it up now - stay tuned. I'm sorry this has been such a painful experience!
Hi Achenar, this happened to me as well, I bought for 3 people, only got one code from Events, could you please help?
Hey WheatD! Once I get this solved it should be solved for everyone - not just any one individual. Sorry for the delay as I get this sorted!
I only Bought one ticket and still have not received any code, very very sad

Hey there, did you buy the ticket online or at the venue?
If you did buy online, would you mind sending us the email address that you used when purchasing the ticket? You can send it to ocelivereports@riotgames.com
We'll then follow up with Event if you should have received a code

Of course also make sure that you're checking your spam filters!

Yes I did buy a ticket Online, however, I have not received any email in my main or any other subfolders in regards to the cosmic ashe skin code.

I have forwarded the email for the ticket purchase for your discretion
Thank you, we're passing this on to Event to figure out where the problem is.
Just an Update, Its all fixed now I Just received the email. Thanks so much guys!
Thanks for the update, good to hear.
No worries, sorry this has been such a pain!
Hey Yuna! Did you buy your ticket online or at the counter?
Online unfortunately

Leaving my two cents here - 

I bought 3 tickets for the event, received one skin code.

I emailed Event Cinemas about it, asking for two more codes. Received the following response:

_"The skins that were offered online were one per online booking, unfortunately it wasn't one per ticket."_

HI Schumi, definitely not the case. If you've still not received your other codes then please follow the process [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dErMsi9w-worlds-2018-viewing-party-still-missing-skin-codes-read-this).

All good Achenar (OCE)

I realise these things happen.
Im just glad you guys are aware and are working on the issue.
I'll pass this one on for you so it can get sorted out. I can't imagine why it would be one code per transaction, so there's probably some issues along the line.
Same problem here, 3 tickets purchased online but only one key issued. We tried to all enter the code to see if that would work but it only worked the first time. :(

Hi if you've still not received your other codes then please follow the process [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dErMsi9w-worlds-2018-viewing-party-still-missing-skin-codes-read-this).

All fixed up now, Thank you Achenar, Seras Dragon and Mama Meep for your quick work

I apologise for any inconveniences i have caused :D{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Hi Neojoke,  thanks for posting the issue, I just received 1 code from events where I bought for my two other buddies, did you email events to get it fixed?
Hi WheatD, I just emailed you back. I think you should now be sorted but let me know if not.

No need to apologise at all - this should never have been a problem in the first place!

I'm actually still in the process of following this up - would you mind letting me know whether this was solved manually by the Event support team or whether you just received another email with your outstanding 3 codes?
Heyo. I've just sent an email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com regarding my issue of also not receiving my skin code. Hopefully this gets fixed soon.{{champion:268}}
Hey there, we sent a reply, you should be all sorted now.
Sorry for the troubles, I have also not yet received my codes, I have forwarded my email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com and is awaiting reply
Thanks! Event have retrieved your codes and I replied to the email with them.

Hi all, 
I emailed my local Events ahead to ask if it was one skin code per ticket or one skin code per order. They confirmed for me that it was ONE SKIN CODE PER TICKET. I wish I could show you a screenshot of their email to me but I can't see it as an option here. It's totally unfair if it's one code per purchase. We all wanted to go, would've purchased individually but what happens if you wanted to sit next to friends and then seats were sold between each individual ticket purchase amongst the group of friends??
I haven't even received my skin codes yet though because apparently I didn't tick the "Please send me promos and discounts" box. 
>_____________________> But I have forwards my proof of purchase through to the email listed in the comments.

Hey Valkyrie, thanks for flagging this with us. It looks like (with the exception of one or two rogue Event support folk) everyone is in agreement that there **should** have been one code per seat/ticket sent out. For some reason this isn't the case and the Event team are investigating at the moment.

We'll follow up on your email ASAP!

Thanks for your patience, this definitely hasn't been an ideal experience. :(

Thanks Achenar, 
I just wanted to update you and all others, I have received all my skin codes from the Riot staff today :)

I bought the ticket online, I received an email from Event cinema's with the remaining skin codes.
